from synapse.ml.cognitive import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
import pandas as pd 


textKey = "0b7ca55ae67241bb826d1654d69e1676"

# Load the data into a Spark DataFrame
df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM sparkml.FedReserveSocialPosts")

sentiment = (TextSentiment()
            .setSubscriptionKey(textKey)
            .setLocation("eastus")
            .setTextCol("Post_text")
            .setOutputCol("sentiment")
            .setErrorCol("error")
            .setLanguageCol("language"))

#sentiment.transform(df).show()
results = sentiment.transform(df)

#print(results.printSchema())

from pyspark.sql.functions import col
import pandas as pd 

df = results

new_df = df.select(col("publication_date"), 
                   col("Post_text"), 
                   col("sentiment.document.sentiment").alias("sentiment"),
                   col("sentiment.document.confidenceScores.positive").alias("ConfidenceScorePositive"),
                   col("sentiment.document.confidenceScores.neutral").alias("ConfidenceScoreNeutral"),
                   col("sentiment.document.confidenceScores.negative").alias("ConfidenceScoreNegative")
                 
                   )


#Convert to Pandas dataframe 
pandasDF = new_df.toPandas()


#Write to csv file
pandasDF.to_csv('abfss://predict@saprvsynraw3ag3v.dfs.core.windows.net/SentimentAnalysis/FedReserveSentimentAnalysisRaw.csv', 
                        index=False, 
                        storage_options = {'linked_service' : 'DEMO ADLS'})

  .format("jdbc") \
